name: Slime Climb (Ace Savaid, SmoonthyTMG, AlbertTranOTU, SebF4)
name_original: Slime Climb (Ace Savaid, SmoonthyTMG, AlbertTranOTU, SebF4)
description:
Made in 2 weeks for Game Development Workshop 3 at Ontario Tech University.

You are a slime stuck in a cave with your mini slime friend.   Use your slime buddy's grapple tongue to attach and swing across obstacles and climb through the cave with the quest to one day see the sunlight together.

Controls

WASD - Movment (Air Movement)

Space - Jump (Boost in Air)

Ctrl - Crouch

Shift - Spring

Left Click - Swing

Right Click - Grapple

Credits
